YoutubeToMP3.projectDescr: Converts YouTube playlists to MP3 for offline usage. All you have to do is paste your playlist link.
YoutubeToMP3.projectSkills: React, JavaScript, Python, Flask, Youtube Data API, Tailwind CSS

FUNdamentals.projectDescr: A platform that offers you a curated set of resources to help you build your understanding from the ground up.

Hangman.projectDescr: Classic Hangman game with definitions from Merriam Webster Dictionary API as hints, to help make learning english fun, and improve vocabulary for all.
Hangman.projectSkills: React, TypeScript, Merriam Webster API, Tailwind CSS

CohereGenerator.projectDescr: Writing a blog? Don't know where to start? This Food Blog Inspiration Generator powered by Cohere has you covered!
CohereGenerator.projectSkills: React, Cohere, Node.js, Express.js, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript

MyWeather.projectDescr: A weather app that displays the weather forecast for any location using the OpenWeather API.
